description: This file defines the 'Booking' entity class for a taxi booking platform, representing ride requests with associated metadata, relationships, and lifecycle hooks.

classes.name: Booking
classes.description: Entity class representing a taxi ride booking with fields for user, driver, pickup/dropoff locations, status, timestamps, and lifecycle event handling.

methods.name: Booking(Long, User, Driver, String, String, BookingStatus)
methods.description: Parameterized constructor to initialize a Booking with specific details.

methods.name: onUpdate
methods.description: Pre-update hook to set the 'updatedAt' timestamp before the entity is saved.

methods.name: getUser
methods.description: Getter for the User who requested the ride.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Setter for the user who requested the ride.
